subject: Extortion and Blackmail
Sentences (Criminal)
Crime and Criminals
lead_paragraph: A Kentucky woman was convicted of demanding millions of dollars from Louisville Coach Rick Pitino to keep their one-night stand in a restaurant a secret, then claiming Pitino raped her after he reported the extortion.
snippet: A Kentucky woman was convicted of demanding millions of dollars from Louisville Coach Rick Pitino to keep their one-night stand in a restaurant a secret, then claiming Pitino raped her after he reported the extortion.
